root: ^I've got to help him... He's weak and defenceless, and he's got nothing to do with this war.
^Nobody's left here, everyone has been killed. I can't leave him here, he's so small... he won't survive if I don't take him with me.
^It's okay, I'm not going to hurt you. I'll keep you safe. What's your name?
^He's too traumatised to respond. I'll get him away from here now and ask questions later.
